responses.title: You can call me Al! He's the brains of the operation.
I'm the brains! And I'm the brawn!

name: Unstable Concoction thrown just in time

responses.title: Didn't you hear me telling you to throw it?
First Blood! We're off to an explosive start!

name: Killing a hero with Unstable Concoction

responses.title: Mixed that up special for you!
It's all part of the formula.
You've been mixing with the wrong crowd.
That's you distilled to your essence.
You're melting, you're melting, ha ha!
The boss said you had to go.
You want I should keep punching him, boss?
Aw, I was just getting started.
Damn, was gonna ask Batrider if he wanted to trade mounts. Hey!
You don't think Pudge will mind if we salvage him for fluids, do ya?
Pudge, were you tapping methane? Yikes!
I always wondered what you'd get if you melted Apparition down.
All right! Fairy dragon blood is hard to come by.
Hey, you think Kunkka knew I stole his rum?
Morphling, if I could have shoved you in a beakerâ€¦
Clinkz, your bones were brittle. Shoulda eaten more spinach.
Pugna's full of phosphorus? That makes sense.
A little mercury goes a long way, eh, Slardar?
Thanks to Slardar I can rig up an excellent mercury switch.
Get out the siphon. Clockwerk's full of gasoline!
Sniper, if you're done with all that gunpowder, I can use it.
I didn't need a tree trunk to knock you out, Earthshaker.
My fists beat your axe, Axe.
You made my knuckles bleed, Spirit Breaker.
Easy now, this stuff is explosive!
Tiptoe now, you're shaking my brew!
I always do your dirty work.
My little friend wants a word with you.
We got something special for you.
Got a fresh batch on the way.
I don't wanna walk in that.
Gotta get rid of this stuff!
Little bit of this, little bit of that.
I can't believe I'm seeing this with my own eyes!
I'm gonna need a bin for it all.
Now that's how you make gold.
How'd I get mixed up in this!
Sorry, friend, I let you down.
Don't put me out of my misery yet.

name: After dying with Aegis of the Immortal

responses.title: Let's see if I can improve on that formula.
I've got some new recipes to try out.
Failure is just another kind of success. The wrong kind.
Well, that was a waste of ingredients.
That's one way to work out the impurities.
Maybe I should find some more stable formulas.
I hope I didn't leave anything on the burner.
You're all right, you know that?
Say hello to the nice people. Eh, he's shy.
Oh, this is gonna be good! Is it new shoes?
We pooled our money for this!
I love buying new equipment! Is it a back brace?
Blink dagger! Less walking is good!
We're gonna have some fun with this!
Assault Cuirass! Boss, that's not gonna fit on you.
Everything good comes from a bottle.
Trust me, you didn't want it anyway.
The whole world went to lead!
Does Immortality work for both of us? It better!
No more splitting the damage between us.
I don't think I have enough bottles for all of us!
Been trying to figure out this formula for ages.

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: Maybe you want to trade places?
Next time maybe I can try throwing?
What were you thinking? Shut up!
Not your best work, boss. You're telling me?
That didn't go so well. Thanks for pointing out the obvious.
I have to say--If I want your opinion, I'll ask for it!
Hey little buddy, itâ€™s in the bag!
